name: Godzilla (1990)
description: Godzilla (ゴジラくん 怪獣大行進, Gojira-kun: Kaijū Daikōshin) is a Game Boy video game developed by Compile. Although it was released in 1990 (1991 in Europe), all of the monsters are from the Showa generation. The game is a port of an edition from the MSX console. Also the international version is slightly different from the Japanese version (different in-game character designs and behavior of the enemy characters).
